timeline.message:
[WFLY-13023] Upgrade MicroProfile Config 1.4

* Upgrade smallrye-config 1.6.0
* Update the GAV of smallrye-config artifacts
* Removed invalid assertions from MicroProfileConfigTestCase: if the
  only value provided by @ConfigProperty is invalid, the deployment must
  fail.
JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13023

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

[WFLY-13023] Upgrade MicroProfile Config 1.4

* Upgrade smallrye-config 1.6.1
* Update the GAV of smallrye-config artifacts
* Removed invalid assertions from MicroProfileConfigTestCase: if the
  only value provided by @ConfigProperty is invalid, the deployment must
  fail.
JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13023

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: What is the reason for removing this asserts? Is it related with eclipse/microprofile-config#446 ?
timeline.author: marekkopecky

replies.bodyText:
this assert was incorrect and revealed a bug in smallrye-config.
When the config property had a default value that could not be converted to the expected type, smallrye-config set it to the "default value" of the types (e.g. 0 for int).
With smallrye/smallrye-config#211, it has been fixed. The default value will be converted and this throw an exception that would prevent the deployment to be deployed.
replies.author: jmesnil
